name: Create Your Own Universe
description:
Create Your Own Universe is a survival, crafting, exploration, base building, third person, open world, go anywhere you see on screen space game.

In CYOU you will take a journey to construct your own universe. You will create star systems, star clusters, even galaxies, after completing the main story line and/or gaining the sufficient abilities. Players will be in interaction with each other; cancelling or amplifying each other's choices. The community will decide the overall outcome of all scenarios. Every player, every choice, every interaction is important!
